thread.title: First trip to NYC
thread.title_full: First trip to NYC - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jonathan R
title: First trip to NYC
text: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for price and convince and it did not disappoint. The front desk staff was very attentive and friendly. Service throughput the staff was great as well. The hotel was in a great location for a walk or subway ride to Battery Park or Central Park and all spots in between.
